title: client issues in game
body: so after the client went down this morning for work on the server i have had issues in game such as minions freezing and clock stopes working but i can move around even after i die i uninstalled the game reinstalled and no fix i also noticed that when i creat a game my icon does not show up it shows my default icon  like i said this started after the work on the server around 3 am this morning

replies.body:
Are you still experiencing this issue? If so, it definitely could be an issue with your connection to the server along your ISP's routing, as *Hivenst* mentioned. If you still see this issue, I recommend ensuring your local network settings are A-Okay by double checking with our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if anything changes.

its just acting very weird it keeps disconnecting me from chat and keeps saying retrieving data from server the game was working fine untill the work they did on the server early this morning after that everything has a huge delay keeps dc'ing me and ive done everything i can to fix it
Could be  connection from your isp to the server i would file a official ticket over on the support site.  Also resting the router sometimes helps this issue.

This seems to be similar to a issue I'm facing but I'm still able to still play 100% and it doesn't affect me but the timers are unshockable, after around 10 games i noticed it fixed itself. 

Hopefully they will roll out a small hotfix for this till then document what you have and screen shot it mate ^_^ pictures are great for seeing whats going on.
